attributes.action: Election Observers to monitor London Elections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The London and forthcoming local elections should be overseen by European Election Observers. This is to make sure that we have a transparent and fair election process. 
The problems with postal voting remains as does the problems of the electronic voting machines. We need a fair election process for London and the local elections. It is thus appropriate to have EU monitors to oversee the election process here in the United Kingdom.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
